Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: One is the T312S mutation , a novel mutation found exclusively in milder patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| milder patients (presumably referring to patients with a milder form of a disease) |

Please note that the specific disease is not mentioned in the paragraph. The text only refers to "milder patients," which implies the existence of an underlying disease, but the disease itself is not identified.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| T312S mutation |

The T312S mutation is the only clear disease-related entity in the paragraph. It is a mutation and could potentially be associated with a disease, but the specific disease is not mentioned in the paragraph.
